children.name: postgresql:11.6.26
children.description: PostgreSQL (Postgres) is an open source object-relational database known for reliability and data integrity. ACID-compliant, it supports foreign keys, joins, views, triggers and stored procedures.

name: odoo:21.5.5
description: Odoo is an open source ERP and CRM platform, formerly known as OpenERP, that can connect a wide variety of business operations such as sales, supply chain, finance, and project management.
